p.s: Food preparation is somewhat a tough task .

There is always an element of challenge available the time of food preparation considering how advanced kitchen appliance you may have how proficient the cooking techniques may be , or how easy the recipe might be .
Moreover , the task is not after preparing the food because you have to store the food for the further meal .
There are many innovations available to store the foods , as an example Refrigerator .
Food storage processes have also gone through an evolution over the century .
With the invention of refrigerators , people can breathe a sigh of relief as they made it too easy to store any food easily inside them .
Moreover , deep freezers were also introduced primarily for bulk storage of food .
Ever thought about storing the food without a refrigerator ?
Do you now how to store cooked food properly .
Here you will come to know about storing the foods in many ways .
Well , every innovation that arrives on the market brings some new set of problems which are hard to deal .
Refrigeration and food storage also have some common issues where food turns deteriorate , or it no longer remains the same as new .
In the article , we are going to address you to some of the most common food storage problems .
We will also advise some tips and tricks focusing on frozen storage which will help you store the food for a longer period without losing the flavor of the food or rotting it .

item.s: Wrapping/Covering is one of the most proficient food storage techniques most widely used around the globe .
This method is suitable for travelers who cannot carry any other food storage with them .
The main thing while storing food is to preserve the moisture in the food without letting the air get to it .
By wrapping the food , you can hold the moisture in it and also the food will remain fresh for an extended period .
So , what material should you use wrap food ?
Well , there are many food wrappers available these days .
Aluminum foil is the best material to wrap and store food while traveling .
If you wish to store your food in freezers , the best options are freezer storage bags , plastic wraps and plastic coated freezer paper .
If you want to store foods for eating it later you have to use plastic box or bags .
When you are intending to store cooked foods like meat fish or desserts you should use plastic boxes and bags to wrap it over .
Poultry and meat are the most troublesome ingredients to store .
Cooked meat contains more content of moisture than the raw meat , so it is important to preserve the moisture .
For storing cooked meat and poultry in a freezer , the best technique is to wrap the meat tightly in a plastic wrapper/aluminum foil or keep it in a plastic box .
Make sure to debone the meat and keep it in larger pieces before wrapping .
Also , you should ensure that the air cannot get into the food .
After wrapping , immediately store the food in zero degrees Fahrenheit .

s.hi: Type of meat you should freeze :

item.s: You can freeze almost all kinds of meat .
People sometimes ask whether they can freeze tenderized meat or not .
As tenderizing comes into effect while cooking meat , it can be frozen .
However , you cannot store or freeze canned meat because

p.s: • Most canned foods have liquids inside them , and seals of the can prone to breakage while you freeze it . •
Canned items are covered with moisture .
Hence , the food inside a can is already stored , so there is no need to store a can full of foods .
You can keep it in a cool place , on your shelf or in the refrigerator in a normal cooling mode .

item.s: One common issue about storing the food is freezing time .
Well , there is no such limit regarding how long you should store/ freeze the foods in a refrigerator .
But due to dehydration , the food may lose somewhat its flavor .
Wrapping your foods well can keep the flavor of the foods for a long time .
If you wrap the food well it may remain fresh for years or two .
There is another primary objective of food storage and it is to preserve the nutrients of food .
Hence , food storage addresses to the requirement very well .
While you freeze the food , it does not lose the nutrients .
Sometimes , the food only loses the flavor .
However , the protein content of meat or poultry slightly reduces while freezing .
But it only occurs if you store it crossing the limited time of 9 months .

s.hi: Storing Food In a pressure cooker :

item.s: Modern day pressure cookers are like hotpot .
After cooking your dish , you can also store it in a pressure cooker .
If you cook large dishes like a roast with vegetables , fish , meat dishes , and chicken , then you may want to store it overnight and have the leftovers the next day .

As the
Best Electric Pressure Cooker
can keep the food warm even after 5 hours of cooking you can easily store the food in it .
Freezer Burns is the process where the surface of the food dries off in a while freezing .
In case you forget to cover your food before storing it in the freezer , there can be high chances of freezer burns to your food .
It makes food dehydrated , and the dehydrated spot is left dry , tasteless and affects the quality of food .
Freezer burns happen because insufficient covering allows the air to get to the food .
Leaked plastic bags are also responsible for freezer burn .
Freezer burns leave brownish gray spots on foods , and the food becomes dry .
However , it damages the food to an extent where the food no longer remains eatable .
